Text: Nice collection...though the Boyzone song you included isn't the one written by Steinman.  As far as I know he only wrote 'No Matter What' for Boyzone.

Thanks so much for this. I am Jim's servant here on earth.  Great collection. Also look for The Storm by Garth Brooks and Barbara Streisand doing Left in the Dark.
Pls seed, I love this stuff
As much as I like Dead Ringer, Bad For Good, and of course Bat 1 and 2; I hate to admit that Steinman is a bit of a one-trick-pony. Statistically speaking, Adele has had more hit singles and albums.
